languages.text: На вид-скрине отображена карта с маршрутами флота Саргоны. Согласно ей, капитан курсировал между торговыми путями и неизменно возвращался в системы, где были замечены друкари.

A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.
languages.original_text: На вид-скрине отображена карта с маршрутами флота Саргоны. Согласно ей, капитан курсировал между торговыми путями и неизменно возвращался в системы, где были замечены друкари.

traits.locale_text: On the vid-screen, a map shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the map, the captain has been roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari have been sighted.

On the vid-screen, a map shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the map, the captain has been roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari have been sighted.

A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

languages.text: Eine Karte auf dem Vid-Bildschirm zeigt die Bewegungen von Sargonas Flotte an. Den Daten zufolge hat der Kapitän zwischen den Handelsrouten gelauert und ist regelmäßig in Systeme geflogen, in denen Drukhari gesichtet worden waren.
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: Eine Karte auf dem Vid-Bildschirm zeigt die Bewegungen von Sargonas Flotte an. Den Daten zufolge hat der Kapitän zwischen den Handelsrouten gelauert und ist regelmäßig in Systeme geflogen, in denen Drukhari gesichtet worden waren.

languages.text: La carte affichée sur l'écran montre les mouvements de la flotte de Sargona. D'après les données, le capitaine rôdait le long des routes commerciales tout en revenant régulièrement dans des systèmes ayant signalé la présence de Drukharis.
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: La carte affichée sur l'écran montre les mouvements de la flotte de Sargona. D'après les données, le capitaine rôdait le long des routes commerciales tout en revenant régulièrement dans des systèmes ayant signalé la présence de Drukharis.

languages.text: La videopantalla muestra un mapa con los movimientos de la flota de Sargona. Según los datos, el capitán recorría varias rutas comerciales y viajaba periódicamente a sistemas donde se detectaba actividad Drukhari.
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: La videopantalla muestra un mapa con los movimientos de la flota de Sargona. Según los datos, el capitán recorría varias rutas comerciales y viajaba periódicamente a sistemas donde se detectaba actividad Drukhari.

languages.text: 视讯屏幕上的地图显示着萨戈纳舰队的动向。根据数据显示，萨戈纳舰长曾在众多贸易航线之间漫游，期间不断返回黑暗灵族出没的星系。
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: 视讯屏幕上的地图显示着萨戈纳舰队的动向。根据数据显示，萨戈纳舰长曾在众多贸易航线之间漫游，期间不断返回黑暗灵族出没的星系。

languages.text: ビデオスクリーン上の地図に、サルゴナ艦隊の航路が表示されている。記録によれば、キャプテンは複数の交易ルートを巡回しつつ、デュカーリの目撃情報があった星系にたびたび戻っていたようだ。
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: ビデオスクリーン上の地図に、サルゴナ艦隊の航路が表示されている。記録によれば、キャプテンは複数の交易ルートを巡回しつつ、デュカーリの目撃情報があった星系にたびたび戻っていたようだ。

languages.text: Video ekranındaki bir harita, Sargona'nın filosunun hareketlerini gösteriyor. Haritadaki verilere göre kaptan, ticaret rotaları arasında sürekli gidip gelse de son durağı hep Drukharilerin görüldüğü sistemler olmuş.
languages.original_text: A map on the vid-screen shows the movements of Sargona's fleet. According to the data, the captain was roaming between trade routes while consistently going back to systems where the Drukhari had been sighted.

traits.locale_text: Video ekranındaki bir harita, Sargona'nın filosunun hareketlerini gösteriyor. Haritadaki verilere göre kaptan, ticaret rotaları arasında sürekli gidip gelse de son durağı hep Drukharilerin görüldüğü sistemler olmuş.
